src:
Harga Bawang hingga Daging Ayam Naik Bikin Oktober Inflasi
01 Nov 2019, 02:21 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: dok detikcom

Jakarta - Kenaikan sejumlah bahan pangan membuat inflasi Oktober menjadi 0,02%. Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat kenaikan harga daging ayam ras memicu inflasi pada bulan kemarin."Ada beberapa komoditas bahan makanan naik, harga daging ayam ras naik dan andilnya kepada inflasi 0,05%," ujar Kepala BPS Suhariyanto dalam jumpa pers di kantornya, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).Selain itu, komoditas bawang merah juga menyumbang inflasi dengan andil yang tipis 0,02%. Sedangkan untuk makanan jadi, minuman, dan rokok memberikan andil 0,08% terhadap inflasi Oktober.Kemudian, transportasi, komunikasi, dan jasa keuangan tercatat mengalami deflasi 0,08% dengan andil 0,02%.Suhariyanto mengatakan bahwa pada bulan kemarin inflasi inti sebesar 0,17% dengan andil 0,10%."Itu menunjukkan bahwa daya beli masyarakat bagus," tuturnya. Simak Video "Imbas Hiperinflasi, Warga Venezuela Beli BBM Pakai Rokok"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/eds)
text:
Prices of Onions to Chicken Meat Rise Up October Inflation
Nov 01 2019, 02:21 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: doc detikcom

Jakarta - An increase in a number of food items made inflation in October to 0.02%. The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) noted an increase in the price of broiler chicken fueled inflation last month. "There were several food commodity prices going up, the price of broiler chicken went up and contributed to inflation of 0.05%," BPS Head Suhariyanto said at a press conference at his office , Central Jakarta, Friday (1/11/2019). In addition, the shallot commodity also contributed to inflation with a thin contribution of 0.02%. As for processed foods, beverages, and cigarettes contributed 0.08% to October inflation. Then, transportation, communication, and financial services recorded a deflation of 0.08% with a share of 0.02%. Suhariyanto said that last month core inflation amounted to 0.17% with a share of 0.10%. "That shows that the purchasing power of the community is good," he said. Check out the video "Impact of Hyperinflation, Venezuelans Buy BBM Using Cigarettes" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (fig / eds)
